articles.title: Kim Jong Un Publishes Work on Stepping up Construction of Stockbreeding Base
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Publishes Work on Stepping up Construction of Stockbreeding Base
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un published work "Let Us Expedite the Construction of the Livestock Breeding Base in the Sepho Area and Bring about a New Turn in Developing Animal Husbandry" on Jan. 28.
					 In the work he stressed the need to provide the people, who have overcome all sorts of difficulties and trials together with the party, entrusting everything to it, with an affluent and happy life with no more to desire in the world at an early date.
					
					 The most important task facing us today is to rapidly improve the standard of people's living, he said, adding to this end it is imperative to solve the food problem by developing stock-breeding and fishery while doing farming well.
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea set forth the policy of reclaiming the Sepho tableland to develop stock-breeding and turning it into a large-scale stock-breeding base, he noted.
					
					 To reclaim the Sepho tableland and turn it into a stock-breeding base is one of the earnest behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il,  he said.
					
					 Saying that though we have made big achievements in the construction of the stock-breeding base in Sepho area, we still have huge tasks to do in the future, he clarified tasks to be fulfilled and ways for doing so.
					
					 The most important issue in building Sepho area into the large-scale stock-breeding base is to improve soil quality and create pasture well, he said, and continued:
					
					 As Sepho area is exposed to strong wind all the year round, it is necessary to carry out the work for creating windbreaks in a planned and prospective way.
					
					 Construction projects such as dwelling houses, sheds for domestic animals and public buildings and roads should be stepped up and be completed qualitatively.
					
					 Oil, building materials, manpower and equipment needed for the construction of the stock-breeding base should be provided on a preferential basis.
					
					 Good preparations should be made for operating the base.
					
					 The work of reclaiming the tableland and building a stock-breeding base is a project to be pushed forward with the involvement of all members of the party and the state.
					
					 It is also important to rapidly develop the nation's overall stock-breeding while stepping up the construction of the stock-breeding base in Sepho area.
					
					 The party channels efforts into the construction of the base to attain an important objective to bring about a fresh turn in the development of the nation's overall stock-breeding with this construction as a momentum.
					
					 It is also necessary to put the production at the modern stock-breeding bases that had already been built under the leadership of the party on a regular footing.
					
					 It is the duty and moral obligation of we, officials who are soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il to put the production at the stock-breeding bases that had already been built on a regular footing and make people realize his loving care and solicitude in their actual life.
					
					 To put production at the stock-breeding bases on a regular footing is not just a business work but an important political work for preserving and glorifying the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The work for boosting the output of livestock products should be pushed forward as an all-people movement.
					
					 To develop stock-breeding, it is also important to solve the issues of breeds of domestic animals and feed, improve breeding and establish a thorough anti-epizootic measure, he said, elaborating on it.
					
					 Many domestic animals of good stock should be produced through intensified work for raising domestic animals, he noted, and went on:
					
					 It is also necessary to conduct brisk scientific and technological exchanges with other countries to introduce into the country domestic animals of superior stock and rear them after going through trial stages.
					
					 A way of solving the issue of feed for domestic animals is to carry out the party's policy of obtaining meat from grass.
					
					 To this end it is imperative to create vast pasture in every place.
					
					 Grain feed needed for stock-breeding should be ensured through good farming.
					
					 The production of bean cake should be increased by cultivating bean extensively and various protein feed sources including insects rich in protein content be actively explored and put into use.
					
					 The way of producing feed additives relying on locally available raw materials should be studied and completed to ensure the supply of feed additives necessary for operating the stock-breeding bases.
					
					 The production of feed for domestic animals should be industrialized by dint of modern science and technology.
					
					 The raising and tending of domestic animals should be done on a scientific and rational way.
					
					 The role of stock-breeding scientific research institutions should be enhanced in establishing the scientific way of raising and tending.
					
					 In order to put the raising and tending of domestic animals on a scientific basis it is necessary for officials and other working people in the field of stock-breeding to acquire professional scientific and technological knowledge and technical skills.
					
					 The anti-epizootic work is what keeps stock-breeding alive.
					
					 Not a slightest concession should be allowed in issues concerning anti-epizootic work.
					
					 Kim Jong Un underlined the need for party organizations to increase their roles in carrying out the party's policy on revitalizing the stocking-breeding and improving the standard of people's living.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Congratulates to Greek PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Congratulates to Greek PM
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju on Jan. 27 sent a congratulatory message to Alexis Tsipras upon his election as Greek prime minister.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for the stability and development of Greece.

articles.title: S. Korea's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korea's Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organizations Assailed
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea released a statement on Friday denouncing the conservative group of south Korea for desperately working to revise the "Security Law" (SL) for the worse in a sinister bid to forcibly dissolve the pro-reunification patriotic organizations and stamp out progressive and democratic forces.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Shortly ago, the minister of Justice of south Korea, in his speech on the "2015 working plan" blustered that he would set it as a top priority task of this year to "preserve the nature for defending the value of the constitution" and modify the SL to forcibly dissolve the "anti-state organizations" and "those benefiting enemy."
					
					 In response to it, the chief executive of south Korea encouraged him, saying "any act of violating laws should be severely punished by a legal action."
					
					 At the instruction of the chief executive, the conservative group is now going busy with the moves to revise for the worse the SL aimed at stamping out the pro-reunification patriotic organizations and progressive and democratic forces.
					
					 The south Korean fascist authorities' suppression of the pro-reunification patriotic forces has reached an extreme pitch since the outset of the year.
					
					 This is an unpardonable criminal move to totally stamp out independence, democracy and reunification forces and drive the inter-Korean relations into the worst catastrophe.
					
					 The south Korean fascist authorities have suppressed the pro-reunification patriotic organizations and personages by invoking the SL which brands compatriots as "enemy" after labeling those organizations and personages as "followers of the north." This is, in actuality, an intolerable provocation to the DPRK and a blatant challenge to its patriotic call for achieving the great national unity in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 They talk about "confidence building" and "dialogue" while antagonizing the compatriots in the north and branding the pro-reunification movement as a crime. This is just an insult and mockery of the dialogue partner and no more than a clumsy farce to deceive the public at home and abroad.
					
					 National reconciliation and unity can neither be achieved nor the north-south relations can make any progress as long as such anti-reunification fascist law as the SL remains in force in south Korea.
					
					 The SL should be repealed at once in order to guarantee the democratic freedom and rights of the south Korean people, mend the north-south relations and achieve reunification.
					
					 The south conservative group is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can tide over its ruling crisis and realize its wild ambition for long-term office by suppressing the progressive forces calling for repairing the north-south relations and achieving national reunification by invoking the SL, an old means for suppression.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not forget the miserable ends of the successive rulers who met shameful ruin while stemming on the strength of the SL the trend of the national history toward the improvement of the north-south relations and reunification.

articles.title: Report on S. Korea's Conspiratorial Human Rights against DPRK Released
articles.content:
Report on S. Korea's Conspiratorial Human Rights against DPRK Released
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea on Jan. 30 released an inquiry report disclosing the truth behind the mad-cap anti-DPRK human rights racket being kicked up by the south Korean authorities in collusion with the U.S.
					 The human rights racket being staged by the south Korean conservative forces hell-bent on confrontation with compatriots in the north is a blatant challenge to the DPRK highly dignified with independence, an unpardonable insult to the Korean people enjoying all blessings under the most advantageous socialist system and impudent deception and mockery of the fair-minded world public, the report said, adding:
					
					 The present chief executive of south Korea, even before coming to power, had kicked off an anti-DPRK human rights racket aimed at cooking up the non-existent "human rights issue" of the DPRK, claiming "it is a sin to keep mum about the human rights in the north." 
					
					 After taking office, she set it as an "important task for enforcing her north policy" to settle the issue of "human rights in the north" and singled out it as a core task of the "the second principal plan for the development of south-north relations" which clarified the goal and main orientation of her "north policy" to be enforced during the 5 year-long tenure of her office.
					
					 At "state council meetings", meetings of chief secretaries of Chongwadae, the "ceremony for marking Aug. 15", UN General Assembly sessions, etc. she took the lead in the human rights racket. There she pulled up the DPRK over its human rights performance, "expressing serious concern over starvation and tragic human rights situation."
					
					 The Ministry of Unification, the Intelligence Service, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Justice, the "human rights commission" and other south Korean institutions have been hell-bent on anti-DPRK human rights racket, setting the "human rights issue of the north " as an important annual task of their policy. They asserted "they should feel guilty about their past negligence in dealing with the human rights issue of the north", crying out for "making indefatigable efforts to settle the issue."
					
					 The south Korean authorities, in a bid to make their anti-DPRK human rights racket sound plausible, let die-hard "defectors from the north" make false testimonies in a bid to forge the "human rights issue of the north." 
					
					 As many people became skeptical about testimonies made by human scum, they produced even videos showing interrogations made inside "north's concentration camp of political offenders" for distribution.
					
					 The ultra-right conservative media of south Korea, at the instigation of the authorities, are becoming zealous in hyping the "human rights issue of the north" by giving wide publicity to the false testimonies made by bribed betes noires.
					
					 Those of the "Saenuri Party" are getting frantic in their moves to ram the 10-year old "bill on human rights in the north" through the "National Assembly" at any cost.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are running the whole gamut of gimmicks to build a world public opinion about the "human rights issue in the north" and realize the international cooperation in the campaign to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 During her trips to 22 countries and her participation in 14 international meetings after taking office, the present chief executive didn't forget to mention the "human rights issue in the north " and let loose a whole string of jargons about "universally accepted value," "concern of the international community", "cooperation" and the like in a bid to garner the cooperation of the international community in the anti-DPRK human rights racket.  
					
					 The south Korean authorities, in collusion with the U.S., are getting frantic in their anti-DPRK human rights racket at the UN to internationalize the "human rights issue" of the DPRK.
					
					 Last year the conservative forces in south Korea worked with bloodshot eyes to set up "a commission of inquiry into human rights in the north" in collusion with the U.S. 
					
					The south Korean authorities allowed the UN office on "human rights in the north" to be set up in south Korea, a thrice-cursed act of treachery.
					
					 They have been desperate in their human rights racket to impair the dignity of the DPRK and tarnish its image by letting human scum to tell all sorts of lies in foreign countries.
					
					 While trumpeting about the non-existent "human rights issue in the north", they are working hard to prevent south Koreans from knowing about the true human rights performance in the DPRK where the dignity and rights of the people are guaranteed at the highest level.
					
					 In the first year of the present regime in south Korea 497 websites of various forms were closed or disconnected after being branded as the ones "following the north" and "benefiting enemy." This was 23 percent more than those in the previous year. Those numbered at least 1 000 last year.
					
					 The south authorities are suppressing south Koreans by invoking the draconian "Security Law" in a bid to quell their voices admiring and praising the DPRK where the popular masses are enjoying a happy life and their ideals are coming true.
					
					 They forcibly dissolved the Unified Progressive Party, a legitimate party, on charges that it opposed their racket of "human rights issue in the north" and their racket of confrontation with compatriots in the north and took the lead in the struggle for reconciliation and reunification through alliance with the north, social independence and democratization. Not content with this, they hurled prosecution and other forces into harshly suppressing 100 000 odd members of the party, threatening to indict all of them for "praising and encouraging the north." 
					
					 Even foreigners were of no exception in becoming targets of harsh suppression.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are branding anyone as a "follower" of the north if he or she tries to know about the reality in the north and talks about it, being suspicious of the "issue of human rights in the north" cooked up by them.
					
					 They will have to pay dearly for their treacherous act of taking the lead in the anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestlers Win Gold Medals
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestlers Win Gold Medals
 Tehran, January 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Wi Song and Kim Kum Hyok, DPRK wrestlers, won gold medals at the Yadegar Imam Cup International Cadet Tournament.
					 The tournament, opened in Iran on Thursday, brought together almost 300 wrestlers from more than 10 countries including the DPRK, Russia and Azerbaijan. 
					
					 Pak Wi Song beat down his Ukrainian, Indian and Iranian rivals in preliminary match, quarter finals and semi-finals of 42 kg category freestyle wrestling, advancing into finals.
					
					 In the finals he trounced his Azerbaijani rival 12:2 within 40 seconds of the second round. 
					
					 Kim Kum Hyok defeated his Kazakh and Iranian rivals in 50 kg category freestyle wrestling to advance into finals. 
					
					 In the finals he humbled his Azerbaijani rival 6:0.

articles.title: Efforts for Building Talented Nation in DPRK
articles.content:
Efforts for Building Talented Nation in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A drive is going on in the DPRK to take big strides in making all the people well versed in science and technology and developing the country into a talented nation from the outset of the year.
					 In the secondary general education field, a vigorous campaign was launched to improve teaching and extracurricular education methods in a way to enhance the intellectual and practical abilities of students, in accordance with the enforcement of the universal 12-year compulsory education, and to introduce a new method of examination for properly assessing their attainments.
					
					 Multi-functional classrooms are being arranged at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology, University of Sciences and other schools.
					
					 Also a work goes to more actively introduce diverse information technologies needed for pedagogy and improve the heuristic method of education and enhance the role of educators.
					
					 New teaching plans are being worked out, while education faculties come into being at various universities to train newly-appointed teachers.
					
					 Besides, steps have been taken to construct more school buildings and dormitories, provide modern facilities for experiment and practice and introduce the achievements in educational science.

articles.title: Solar and Lunar Eclipses to Occur This Year
articles.content:
Solar and Lunar Eclipses to Occur This Year
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- This year will witness solar and lunar eclipses, twice each, according to Kang Chang Hyok, section chief of the Pyongyang Observatory.
					 There will be a total solar eclipse on March 20 and a partial solar eclipse on September 13, which can not be observed in Korea.
					
					 A total lunar eclipse is expected to occur on April 4 and September 28.
					
					 The lunar eclipse on April 4 will start at 19:16 and end at 22:46, with its maximum magnitude at 21:02.
					
					 The lunar eclipse in September can not be seen in the country.

articles.title: Nano-based Insecticide Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Nano-based Insecticide Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Nano-based insecticide was developed in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, Prof. and Dr. So Ui Hwa, who is candidate academician at Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA:
					
					 We succeeded in developing nano-based insecticide with waste as raw materials.
					
					 This insecticide, easy to make, has a high rate of killing insects and costs lower than the existing ones. It is applicable to paddy and non-paddy fields.
					
					 Now efforts are paid to recycling various kinds of wastes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams US for Pursuing Hostile Policy toward DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams US for Pursuing Hostile Policy toward DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The world has made a tremendous advance and the times have undergone dramatic changes, but the tragic history of the Korean nation's division has lasted till now. This is entirely attributable to the U.S. which has pursued an anachronistic hostile policy toward the DPRK. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is a product of its deep-rooted policy for dominating the whole of Korea, and it is an inveterate bad habit of the U.S. to fish in troubled waters by taking advantage of distrust and confrontation among Koreans.
					
					 The bosses of the White House were replaced many times and the situation and environment around the Korean peninsula changed a lot but what remains unchanged is the U.S. policy for dominating Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. forces' presence in south Korea is not a simple military presence but is aimed to totally exterminate the Korean nation. Herein lie the danger and criminal nature of the U.S. imperialists' policy of occupying south Korea.
					
					 Neither the peace and reunification of Korea nor the peace and security in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world is thinkable as long as the U.S. keeps south Korea under occupation.
					
					 The U.S. policy of occupying south Korea is the policy of aggression, war and domination contrary to the world trend toward peace and cooperation.
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces from south Korea is a wise action for the U.S.
					
					 To pull the U.S. forces out of south Korea is the urgent task of the times.
					
					 The U.S. should refrain from pursuing its old policy of occupying south Korea, coolly judge the reality and make a bold policy switch.
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its forces from south Korea before it is too late if it wants the peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in the world.

articles.title: Challenge to National Reunification Is Intolerable: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Challenge to National Reunification Is Intolerable: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- With no rhetoric can the south Korean authorities justify their acts of laying a stumbling block in the way of dialogue and cooperation while staging war drills against the other side and kicking up a racket for escalating the confrontation of social systems, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 This is a grave provocative act of escalating the tension and chilling the atmosphere of dialogue on the Korean peninsula, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean authorities described large-scale joint military exercises against the north conducted every year as "annual" and "defensive" ones, a foolish trick to conceal their true colors as war maniacs and disturbers of peace.
					
					 Now is the time to save the destiny of the nation from a crisis through dialogue and negotiations, not by war drills, and join efforts to pave the way for independent reunification. The DPRK will never allow them to justify the joint military exercises against it and spoil the atmosphere of dialogue.
					
					 The moves of the south Korean authorities to escalate the confrontation of social systems are a reckless provocation driving the inter-Korean relations into an extreme pitch of tension and inviting even a war.
					
					 They should immediately halt such treacherous hostile acts as leaflet scattering aimed at ratcheting up confrontation and tension among fellow countrymen while malignantly hurting the dignity and social system of the DPRK.
					
					 They should respond to the proposal of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations at an early date and swim with the trend of the national history to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification, bearing in mind that their persistent enforcement of the anachronistic confrontation policy will make a mess of the destiny of the nation and throw themselves into a pitfall.

articles.title: Japan Must Feel Ashamed of Sexual Slavery: KCNA
articles.content:
Japan Must Feel Ashamed of Sexual Slavery: KCNA
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- 8,749 Japanese politicians and scholars including lawmakers and university professors recklessly denied the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army a few days ago.
					 They filed a collective suit, claiming that the Asahi Shimbun distributed a groundless article all over the world though there is no evidence that the Japanese army forcefully enlisted comfort women. They went the lengths of demanding compensation of 10,000 yen per person and ad for making apology, asserting that the belated cancellation of the article hurt the honor of Japanese people. 
					
					 The international community cannot but be stunned by this shameless tendency of the Japanese society. 
					
					 Japan represents a group of morally depraved guys who are making desperate efforts to cover up their filthy history of aggression and inhumane crimes at any cost. 
					
					 The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is a hideous crime against humanity unprecedented in the history of the imperialists' war of aggression. 
					
					 The Japanese imperialists enforced sexual slavery on the basis of the abnormal military theory under the pretext of "preserving combat capabilities" of the army. Then they forcibly drafted, kidnapped and abducted about 200,000 Korean women to use them as sexual slaves and mercilessly killed them. 
					
					 However, the ultra-right forces of Japan are desperately working to distort and deny the barbarities committed by the Japanese imperialists including sexual slavery which has been already proved by testimonies made by survivors and a lot of documents and instill a military view on history and revanchism into the younger generation. 
					
					 The Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan recently allowed deletion of descriptions about the sexual slavery from senior high school textbooks. As a result, words "comfort women for the army" and "forcible drafting" disappeared from the textbooks of contemporary society and political economy. 
					
					 In Japan the history textbooks which embellished and justified the aggression in the past increased nearly 10 times as compared with those in the period 10 years ago. 
					
					 Tampering with history is led to the phase of totally distorting and denying the past crimes, after going beyond the practice of hiding and playing down them under the zealous backing and patronage of the Japanese authorities. 
					
					 Japanese politicians unhesitatingly let loose reckless militarist remarks insisting that the decision of the Far Eastern Military Tribunal was not "one of justice" and that Japan "liberated" Asian countries from domination by the Western powers during the Second World War. 
					
					 Now Japanese politicians, educators and media persons who should speak for justice and conscience desperately deny the past crimes. This is the vulgar morality in Japan. 
					
					 This is shame on Japan. 
					
					 The international community is demanding Japan seriously reflect on their history of massacre, destruction and plunder and make sincere apology and reparation this year marking the 70th anniversary of the Japanese imperialists' defeat. 
					
					 There is no future for Japan unless it redeems its inglorious past.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Stage Shelling Drill in West Sea
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Stage Shelling Drill in West Sea
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The marine corps of south Korea staged a shelling drill on Paekryong Island in the sensitive waters of the West Sea of Korea on January 27, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					 The warmongers fired more than 600 shells with artillery pieces deployed on the island, inciting an atmosphere of war against the north. 
					
					 Agents of the "UN Command" were present there to watch the saber-rattling. 
					
					 The "UN Command" lost its justification to function according to a decision of the UN long ago. 
					
					 However, the U.S. keeps it and mulls igniting another war on the Korean peninsula by depending on it as it did in 1950. 
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK to decisively counter any provocations and war moves violating its sovereignty and dignity and mete out punishment to the enemy. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean military warmongers had better bear this in mind and behave themselves. --

articles.title: Court's Unjust Judgment against Members of TU Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Court's Unjust Judgment against Members of TU Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The south Korean authorities have become desperate in the clampdown on the Teachers Union (TU).
					 The Seoul Central District Court sentenced the former senior vice-chairman of the TU and its three members to one year and six months in prison and the same term of suspension of qualifications on charges of violation of the fascist "Security Law" on January 23.
					
					 The Joint Measure Committee of the Teachers Union for Checking Suppression of Teachers under the Pretext of "Security" held a press conference in Seoul in protest against the unjust judgment of the court.
					
					 Speakers said that the authorities had already planned the case as part of the suppression of the TU.
					
					 They condemned the court for making a politically-motivated judgment, siding with the intelligence service and prosecution and studying the face of the "government".

articles.title: S. Korean Workers Stage Action for Right to Existence
articles.content:
S. Korean Workers Stage Action for Right to Existence
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Metal Workers Trade Union of south Korea staged an action to win the right to existence, according to the south Korean Yonhap News.
					 It held a ceremony for declaring an action demanding the authorities ensure labor safety. 
					
					 At the ceremony speakers denounced the present regime for trying to lay off more workers from the outset of the year.
					
					 They declared they would launch an all-out strike in protest against this.
					
					 Then they held a rally at Seoul Square to demand the authorities reinstate the discharged workers of the Ssangyong Motors, turn part-time jobs into full-time ones and stop firing workers under the pretext of restructuring.
					
					 Since the occurrence of the case of the Ssangyong Motors, dozens of fired workers lost their lives, they deplored, adding they would carry on their actions to the last to win the rights of workers.

articles.title: Ruling Forces Slammed for Orchestrating Disbandment of Progressive Party
articles.content:
Ruling Forces Slammed for Orchestrating Disbandment of Progressive Party
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the Movement of the South Jolla Province for Defending Democracy of south Korea and the Solidarity for Progress of the South Jolla Province held a press conference in Kwangju on January 23 at which they denounced the authorities for clamping down the progressive forces, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People.
					 Speakers said at the press conference that  the supreme court at a trial of Ri Sok Gi, lawmaker from the former Unified Progressive Party, and others concerned on January 22 said that "no underground revolutionary organization" existed and there was no suspicion of attempted rebellion but gave a strange verdict that there was agitation of rebellion.
					
					 This overturned the decision of the "constitutional court," they held.
					
					 They condemned the "constitutional court" for making the decision on disbanding the political party in disregard of the law and procedures.
					
					 The Seoul Solidarity for Progress also staged a protest on January 24.
					
					 The organization said that the above-said decision was an action to stamp out democracy.
					
					 Members of the organization staged a demonstration from Jongro District to Tapgol Park in demand of the release of Ri Sok Gi, the abolition of the SL and the guarantee of the freedom of political activities.

articles.title: S. Korean Public Anger at Chief Executive Grows Strong
articles.content:
S. Korean Public Anger at Chief Executive Grows Strong
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The anger of the south Korean public at the present chief executive is growing strong as the days go by.
					 According to the recent results of an opinion poll conducted by a relevant institution in south Korea on Jan. 27, support rate for the present chief executive was 29.7 percent, much lower than that a week ago.
					
					 The poll conducted from Jan. 20 to 22 showed its drop to 30 percent, the lowest.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Called upon to Dedicate Themselves to Struggle for Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Called upon to Dedicate Themselves to Struggle for Reunification
 Tokyo, January 29 (KNS-KCNA) -- Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), on Jan. 28 released a statement in response to the appeal of the joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The master key to opening up a broad avenue to independent reunification is to defuse the danger of war and create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula, the statement said, and continued:
					
					 The U.S., the very one that divided the Korean nation into two, should discontinue its frantic war drills against the DPRK at once and boldly make a policy switch, properly understanding the will of all fellow countrymen to reunify the country. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should refrain from seeking the confrontation with the north and "unification of social systems", considering the fellow countrymen in the north as "the enemy" and opposing the ideology and social system in it, but stop depending on foreign forces and choose to achieve the independent reunification and peace and prosperity by paying heed to the voices of all the fellow countrymen desirous of the detente on the peninsula and its reunification.
					
					 We will play a vanguard role in uniting the pro-reunification forces abroad, thereby making a tangible contribution to marking the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of national liberation as auspicious events of the entire nation to go down in the history of national reunification. 
					
					 Chongryon and Koreans in Japan will dedicate their all to the sacred patriotic struggle for reunification with iron faith that a broad avenue can be opened up thanks to supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Overseas Organizations Support Appeal of DPRK
articles.content:
Overseas Organizations Support Appeal of DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification and the Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany made public a statement on Jan. 22 in support of the appeal adopted at the joint meeting of the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 The appeal said that the Korean nation is standing at the historical crossroads of independent reunification or permanent division, adding that this is a declaration that independent reunification means patriotism while permanent division means treachery.
					
					 It lashed out at the Chongwadae in south Korea for letting loose a whole string of pro-U.S. remarks contrary to the spirit of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 It also accused the Chongwadae of patronizing human scum and a U.S. organization's anti-DPRK leaflet scattering operation, describing it as "freedom of expression".
					
					 All Koreans are greatly enraged by this behavior of the cowardly and wicked south Korean authorities, the statement noted. It called upon all Koreans to pool their efforts and advance along the road of independence.

articles.title: New Year Address Posted by Brazilian Political Party on Its Website
articles.content:
New Year Address Posted by Brazilian Political Party on Its Website
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The part dealing with Korea's reunification in the New Year address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un was posted by the Brazilian Communist Party on its website on Jan. 22.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Spain
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Celebrated in Spain
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- A Spanish national preparatory committee for celebrating the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Madrid on Jan. 24.
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Great Men's Exploits for Youth Movement Praised by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Great Men's Exploits for Youth Movement Praised by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Immortal leadership of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu-69th anniversary of the youth league" on its website on January 23.
					 The article said:
					
					 January 17 is the significant day, the 69th anniversary of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung started his revolutionary activities by finding himself among young people in his early years and rallying them in the fighting rank. He founded the original idea of attaching importance to the young people and successfully embodied it in the whole period of his revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Right after the liberation of Korea he worked heart and soul to rally the broad young people as one under the flag of democracy.
					
					 After laying the firm foundation of the massive youth organization, he founded the Democratic Youth League and clarified the way to be followed by it.
					
					 The youth league became the most viable unit under the outstanding leadership and special care of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He made sure that the Youth Day was instituted, gave the youth the torch of the revolution, saw to it that the youth league was renamed the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and personally awarded the flag of the youth league bearing the image of the President.
					
					 He entrusted major projects to the youth league, took good care of it to perform miracles and feats and made sure that the monumental edifices built by the young people shine their rays together with the name of the "youth".
					
					 Today the Korean youth movement is ushering in a new heyday of its development under the outstanding leadership of respected HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by German Organization
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "The DPRK, the road of revolution being made through generations" on Jan. 22 on the occasion of the 90th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's start of the 250-mile journey for national liberation.
					 The article said that Jan. 22 is a historic day when he started the above-said journey with a far-reaching aim for liberating Korea 90 years ago.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 Seeing Korea groaning under the occupation by the Japanese imperialists while making his journey, he pledged himself not to return home if Korea was not independent.
					
					 He waged the twenty year-long anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle to liberate Korea, and led the Fatherland Liberation War, postwar rehabilitation and construction and socialist construction to victory.
					
					 The 250-mile journey for national liberation made by him is the glorious one which brought the dawn of national rebirth and the historic one which gave origin to the cause of independence.
					
					 The glorious road covered by him was given steady continuity by HE Kim Jong Il, the general of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The Korean people will certainly build a thriving socialist nation in Korea true to the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and dynamically advance along the road of revolution full of conviction in victory under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: US-led "Human Rights" Campaign Denounced by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
US-led "Human Rights" Campaign Denounced by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Personages of Myanmar and Egypt strongly denounced the U.S. and its followers for kicking up their anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					 Tin Tin Moe, member of the executive committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar, released the following statement on Jan. 23:
					
					 The truth behind the conspiratorial "human rights" racket against the DPRK being staged by the U.S. and other hostile forces has been disclosed. I am shocked at this.
					
					 Not content with the desperate moves against the DPRK, the U.S. brought even a "defector from the north" who is a swindler to the international arena and showed such disgusting behavior as highly praising him, only to reveal the true colors of the conspiratorial "human rights" racket before the world.
					
					 What is more shameful is that the UN has danced to the tune of the U.S.
					
					 I strongly urge the U.S. and its followers to immediately stop all their anti-DPRK conspiratorial moves and refrain from abusing the UN arena for its anti-DPRK racket.
					
					 An Egyptian journalist posted an article on his website on Jan. 21, which said:
					
					 The U.S. and other forces hostile toward the DPRK are staging the racket for seriously distorting its reality and human rights performance, in particular.
					
					 It is aimed to interfere in the internal affairs of the DPRK through the "human rights" racket against it and bring down its social system at last.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un publica obra sobre construccion de base ganadera de zona de Sepho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un publica obra sobre construccion de base ganadera de zona de Sepho
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un hizo publica el dia 28 la obra intitulada "Aceleremos la construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho y logremos un nuevo cambio para el desarrollo de la ganaderia".
					En su trabajo, el Mariscal destaco la necesidad de ofrecer, cuanto antes, una vida rica y feliz al pueblo que supero todas las pruebas y dificultades junto con el partido confiandole todo lo suyo y prosiguio:
					
					La importante tarea asumida ante nosotros hoy en dia es elevar rapidamente las condiciones de vida del pueblo. Para ese fin es preciso realizar bien la agricultura y al mismo tiempo solucionar el problema de alimentos al desarrollar la ganaderia y la pesqueria.
					
					Para desarrollar la ganaderia, el Partido del Trabajo de Corea presento la orientacion de roturar la meseta de Sepho y convertirla en una  gran base ganadera.
					
					Roturarla y convertirla en una base ganadera constituye tambien el legado encarecido del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Se obtuvieron muchos exitos en la construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho, pero son tan abundantes las tareas a cumplirse en lo adelante, dijo y aclaro las tareas y los remedios para ese fin.
					
					Lo mas importante en acondicionar la zona de Sepho en una gran base ganadera es preciso hacer bien el mejoramiento de tierra y la  formacion de herbazales. 
					
					Hay que realizar de manera planificada y con vistas al futuro la formacion de bosques cortavientos dado que hace viento fuerte en la zona durante todas las estaciones.
					
					Han de impulsar la construccion de viviendas, corrales, edificios publicos y carreteras y terminarlas cualitativamente.
					
					Hay que asegurar con preferencia los combustibles, materiales, manos de obra e instalaciones necesarias a la construccion de la base ganadera.
					
					Se debe organizar con escrupulosidad los preparativos para la administracion de la base ganadera  en la zona de Sepho.
					
					Roturar la meseta de Sepho para construir la base ganadera es el trabajo a ser impulsado por  todo el partido y todo el pais.
					
					Hay que acelerar la construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho, y al mismo tiempo desarrollar vertiginosamente la ganaderia en general del pais. 
					
					El partido enfoca su fuerza a la construccion de la base ganadera en la zona de Sepho con el objetivo de lograr esta vez nuevo cambio en el desarrollo de la ganaderia en general del pais.
					
					Hay que normalizar la produccion en las modernas bases ganaderas ya construidas bajo la guia del partido.
					
					Hacer que el pueblo experimente en su vida real el amor y la benevolencia del Dirigente al normalizar la produccion en las bases ganaderas ya construidas es el deber y la merecida obligacion moral de los funcionarios, quienes son combatientes y discipulos del Dirigente.
					
					La normalizacion de produccion en las bases ganaderas ya preparadas no es un simple trabajo economico-practico sino la importante labor politica para defender y glorificar las hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente.
					
					Es necesario impulsar vigoroso y masivamente la labor por incrementar la produccion ganadera.
					
					Para desarrollar la ganaderia es imprescindible solucionar el problema de reproductores de los animales domesticos y de pienso, mejorar la cria y el cuido y establecer estrictamente las medidas de prevencion veterinaria.
					
					Se debe obtener muchos animales domesticos de buenos generos al mejorar los trabajos para obtener buenas variedades.
					
					Por otra parte, es necesario introducir los ganados de buena variedad al activar el intercambio cientifico-tecnico con otros paises y criarlos a prueba.
					
					La llave de la solucion del problema de pienso de los ganados reside en materializar la orientacion del partido de producir la carne con las hierbas. Para ese fin es imperativo crear muchos herbazales por doquier del pais.
					
					Los piensos de cereal necesarios a la ganaderia deben ser solucionados al hacer bien la agricultura.
					
					Hay que incrementar la produccion de orujos de soya al cultivar considerablemente las soyas y explorar y aprovechar activamente las fuentes de diferentes piensos proteinicos incluyendo los insectos proteinicos.
					
					Urge producir y suministrar los aditivos de pienso necesarios a la gestion de la base ganadera al investigar y completar el metodo de su produccion basada en propios materiales.
					
					Se debe industrializar la produccion de pienso de ganados a base de ciencias y tecnicas modernas.
					
					Hay que realizar de manera cientifico-tecnica la cria y el cuido de ganado.
					
					Los organos de investigacion de ciencias ganaderas deben elevar su papel para establecer los cientificos metodos de cria y cuido.
					
					Para llevar de manera cientifica la cria y  cuido de ganados, los funcionarios y trabajadores del sector ganadero deben poseer los conocimientos cientificos especializados y la capacidad tecnica.
					
					La prevencion veterinaria es igual a la vida en la ganaderia.
					
					No hay que ceder jamas las cosas insignificantes en los asuntos relacionados con la prevencion veterinaria.
					
					El Mariscal asevero que las organizaciones del partido deben elevar sus papeles en  materializar la politica del partido de mejorar las condiciones de vida al activar la ganaderia.

articles.title: Portavoz de FDRP advierte a banda conservadora surcoreana
articles.content:
Portavoz de FDRP advierte a banda conservadora surcoreana
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias la banda conservadora del Sur de Corea trata de enmendar la "ley de seguridad" con el objetivo de dispersar las entidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion y reprimir a las fuerzas democraticas progresistas, el portavoz del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria hizo publica el dia 31 una declaracion que sigue:
					Hace poco, el ministro de Justicia del Sur de Corea dijo en el "plan de trabajo 2015" que modificara la "ley de seguridad" que permita dispersar las "entidades anti-estatales y las a favor de enemigo" tomando la "preservacion de la naturaleza del regimen con la defensa de valor constitucional" como tarea primordial de este ano.
					
					Y la mandataria surcoreana estimulo a esta locura diciendo que "la ley se debe ejecutar severamente en cuanto a los actos que la desprecian".
					
					Segun la orden de la mandataria surcoreana, la banda conservadora se enfrasca a enmendar la "ley de seguridad" con el proposito de suprimir las entidades patrioticas pro-reunificacion y las fuerzas democraticas progresistas.
					
					Desde principios de este ano llega al climax la represion de las autoridades fascistas contra las fuerzas patrioticas por la reunificacion.
					
					Esto es el crimen imperdonable tendente a eliminar totalmente las fuerzas independientes y democraticas por la reunificacion y empeorar las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					En virtud de la "ley de seguridad" que define a los compatriotas como "enemigos", las autoridades fascistas del Sur de Corea reprimen las entidades y a las personalidades patrioticas tildandolas de "fuerzas pro-Norte", lo cual deviene la provocacion imperdonable contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el abierto desafio a nuestro llamamiento patriotico de lograr gran unidad de toda la nacion bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Hablar de "creacion de confianza" y el "dialogo" hostilizando a los compatriotas y criminalizando los movimientos por la reunificacion es un insulto a su contraparte de dialogo y farsa torpe para enganar la opinion interna y externa.
					
					Mientras siga existiendo la infame y fascista "ley de seguridad" anti-reunificacion, nunca se lograran la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales ni la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					La "ley de seguridad" no se debe enmendar sino abolir ahora mismo tanto para asegurar la libertad y derecho democraticos del pueblo surcoreano,  como para realizar la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de  la patria.
					
					Si la banda conservadora del Sur de Corea piensa en que pueda reprimir las fuerzas progresistas aspirantes a la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion de la patria para evitar la crisis de su gobernacion y realizar su ambicion de toma del poder de largo plazo, esto sera una ilusion muy absurda.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas no tienen que olvidar el destino vergonzoso de los gobernadores antecedentes que se arruinaron al desafiar al corriente de la historia nacional hacia el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion apoyandose en la "ley de seguridad".

articles.title: Publicado reporte de investigacion sobre el complot anti-RPDC en materia de DDHH
articles.content:
Publicado reporte de investigacion sobre el complot anti-RPDC en materia de DDHH
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- La Sociedad de Medidas de Derechos Humanos en el Sur de Corea de la RPDC publico el dia 30 el reporte de investigacion que desenmascara la campana intrigante de DDHH anti-RPDC que libran demencialmente las autoridades surcoreanas junto con Estados Unidos.
					El documento condena que esa campana de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas, enloquecidas por la confrontacion fratricida, resulta un desafio frontal a la RPDC dignificada por su postura independiente, insulto intolerable contra el pueblo coreano que vive felizmente en el mas ventajoso regimen socialista y engano cinico a la imparcial opinion publica del mundo.
					
					De acuerdo con el reporte, la actual mandataria surcoreana, desde antes de su llegada a la "presidencia", trato de inventar el inexistente "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC diciendo que es un "crimen guardar el silencio sobre los DDHH del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					Despues de la toma del poder,  presento la solucion del problema de "DDHH del Norte" como "importante tarea de su politica sobre el Norte" y la estipulo en el "2o plan principal de desarrollo de relaciones S-N", que aclaro la meta y el rumbo principal de la "politica sobre el Norte" a practicar durante 5 anos de su mandato.
					
					Cada vez que tenian las oportunidades tales como la reunion del "Consejo de Ministros", la reunion de secretarios superiores de Chongwadae, el acto central por el "15 de agosto", la Asamblea General de la ONU, etc. la presidenta surcoreana cuestiono el problema de DDHH de la RPDC y se puso al frente de la campana intrigante de DDHH hablando del "hambre y la tragica situacion de DDHH" y de la "seria preocupacion".
					
					Las autoridades del Ministerio de Unificacion, el Servicio Nacional de Inteligencia, el MINREX, el Ministerio de Justicia y el "Comite de DDHH" dijeron que "hay que sentir el remordimiento por haber menospreciado el problema de DDHH del Norte" y "es necesario realizar esfuerzos indoblegables por resolverlo". Y recrudecen cada vez mas la campana de DDHH anti-RPDC definiendo cada ano este problema como importante tarea politica.
					
					Para atribuir la "autenticidad" a la campana, las autoridades surcoreanas instigan a los connotados "fugitivos norcoreanos" a hacer testimonios mentirosos.
					
					Cuando muchas personas dudaban esos testimonios, ellas crearon y divulgaron hasta los videos falsos que muestran el "estado de torturas en el campo de concentracion de presos politicos del Norte de Corea".
					
					Se suman a esta demagogia los medios de prensa conservadores y ultraderechistas del Sur de Corea.
					
					Ahora los compinches del "Partido Saenuri" tratan de aprobar a toda costa en la "Asamblea Nacional" la "ley de DDHH del Norte" que fue desaprobada durante 10 anos.
					
					Las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas intentan internacionalizar el "problema de DDHH del Norte" y lograr asi la cooperacion internacional en las tentativas de atropellar a la RPDC.
					
					En su gira por 22 paises y en 14 conferencias internacionales realizadas durante su mandato, la mandataria surcoreana no olvido mencionar el "problema de DDHH del Norte" usando expresiones como "valor universal", "preocupacion de la sociedad internacional" y "cooperacion".
					
					Sobre todo, las autoridades surcoreanas se confabulan con Estados Unidos en internacionalizar a traves de la ONU el "problema de DDHH" de la RPDC.
					
					Son las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas quienes hicieron todo lo posible por fundar el "comite de investigacion de DDHH del Norte" en cooperacion con EE.UU.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas cometen el acto antinacional de permitir la instalacion en el Sur de Corea de la "oficina de DDHH del Norte" de la ONU.
					
					Llevando a las escorias humanas al extranjero, les hacen decir mentiras y embustes para manchar la dignidad e imagen de la RPDC.
					
					Inventaron el inexistente "problema de DDHH del Norte" y hacen todo lo posible por impedir que los surcoreanos conozcan la verdadera situacion de DDHH de la RPDC donde se garantizan al maximo la dignidad y derechos humanos del hombre.
					
					En el primer ano del mandato del "gobierno" actual, 497 sitios web fueron cancelados o bloqueados siendo acusados de "pronortenos" o "proenemigos". Esta cifra significa un aumento de 23% mas que el ano anterior.
					
					En el ano pasado, llego a mas de un mil el numero de tales casos.
					
					Aplican la "ley de seguridad" para frenar la crecida de partidarios surcoreanos que elogian la RPDC donde se hacen realidad la felicidad e ideal de las masas populares.
					
					Por ejemplo, disolvieron por la fuerza el Partido Progresista Unido, organizacion legitima que estuvo al frente de la lucha por rechazar la campana de "DDHH del Norte" y de confrontacion fratricida y alcanzar la reconciliacion y reunificacion pro-Norte y la independencia y democratizacion de la sociedad.
					
					Insatisfechas de ello, instigan a la fiscalia a acusar a todos los militantes de ese partido cuyo numero llega a mas de 100 mil por el llamado cargo de "delito de elogio y estimulo al Norte".
					
					Hasta los extranjeros son victimas de la brutal represion de las autoridades surcoreanas.
					
					Ellas tildan de "fuerzas pro-Norte" a todas las personas que sospechan el "problema de DDHH del Norte" y quieren conocer o hablar de la realidad de la RPDC.
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas pagaran muy caro su acto criminal antinacional de fomentar el enfrentamiento fratricida y llevar a la catastrofe las relaciones N-S adhiriendose a la politica norteamericana para aplastar a la RPDC.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la negativa al crimen de esclavitud sexual en Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la negativa al crimen de esclavitud sexual en Japon
Pyongyang, 30 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, 8 mil 749 japoneses, incluyendo parlamentarios y profesores, negaron en colectivo la esclavitud sexual impuesta por el ejercito nipon en el siglo pasado.
					Diciendo que "Asahi Shimbun divulgo en todo el mundo un articulo no apegado a la realidad a pesar de que no hay pruebas de que el viejo ejercito japones recluto por la fuerza  a las esclavas sexuales", presentaron en colectivo un pleito contra ese medio.
					
					Demandaron a cada persona 10 mil \ de dinero de consuelo y hasta el anuncio de disculpa diciendo que fue manchado el honor de los habitantes japoneses por la cancelacion tardia del articulo.
					
					El mundo queda consternado ante esa actitud cinica.
					
					Hoy dia, tales tipejos inmorales hacen todo lo posible por encubrir su sucia historia de agresion y crimenes antieticos.
					
					El crimen de esclavitud sexual cometido por el ejercito japones resulta el de lesa humanidad sin precedentes ni en la historia de guerras agresivas estalladas por los imperialistas.
					
					Bajo el pretexto de "conservacion de la capacidad combativa" del ejercito, el imperialismo japones instauro el regimen de esclavitud sexual, que suministra las mujeres como articulos de consumo belico, y secuestro por la fuerza a 200 mil coreanas que posteriormente se hicieron victimas de violacion sexual y asesinato.
					
					Pero, las fuerzas ultraderechistas de Japon tergiversan y niegan los datos relativos a los crimenes, incluso la esclavitud sexual, cometidos por el imperialismo japones, a pesar de que fueron comprobados por los testimonios de las victimas sobrevivientes y muchos documentos. Y tratan de inyectar en las nuevas generaciones la concepcion de la historia imperialista y el revanchismo.
					
					Hace poco, el Ministerio de Educacion, Cultura, Deporte, Ciencia y Tecnologia de Japon permitio borrar en los manuales de las escuelas superiores el contenido referente a la esclavitud sexual.
					
					En comparacion con el tiempo de hace 10 anos, se ha incrementado casi 10 veces el numero de los manuales que encomian y justifican los actos criminales cometidos en el pasado por Japon.
					
					La tergiversacion de historia continua en la negativa total bajo el amparo de las autoridades japonesas.
					
					En el circulo politico suenan sin vacilacion alguna los disparates militaristas que niegan la sentencia de la Corte Militar Internacional del Extremo Oriente calificandola de "injusta".
					
					Ademas, se escuchan sofismas de que en la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon "libero" a los paises asiaticos del dominio de potencias occidentales.
					
					Desde los politicos hasta los profesores y medios de prensa encargados de la educacion de las generaciones venideras y de declarar la justicia y conciencia, niegan obstinadamente los crimenes del pasado, lo cual demuestra la bajeza moral del pais isleno.
					
					He aqui la verguenza de Japon.
					
					En el ano en curso, en que se acogera el 70o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones en la segunda guerra mundial, la sociedad internacional exige a Japon que se arrepienta de su historia de crimenes como asesinato, destruccion y saqueo, pida sinceramente las disculpas y los indemnice debidamente.
					
					No hay futuro para Japon que no liquida su sucio expediente del pasado.
